content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i had just left the lycoming mall in williamsport pa. and were traveling on south 220 when my wife said what the h is that?! only about 100 ft or so above the susquehanna river was a very large diamond shaped craft with over a dozen white lights. not airplane lights these were like the flood lights at a ball park. it was moving slowly south for a minute then it simply banked to the left and disappeared as we passed a cropping of trees.  no noise.. it was dark metallic underneth with some kind of satelite things toward the front end..  others had to see this it was huge and there was a large number of police in the area. maybe a accident at the bridge. but we missed the exit n to 15 becouse we were so distracted by this. i have never seen anything like this in the sky.

i tried to take a picture with my cellphone but none of the buttons worked! it just locked up! it was not untill about a half mile down the road that it worked again. weird stuff.

we were both freaked out. and our 4 yr old daughter saw it too.
content.summary: Large craft with bright white lights & satelite like attachments moved over susquehanna river for a short time and then disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: I am a teacher. at the very end of class, the kids were packing up their bookbags to gp home for the day. 2 boys looked out the window and said "what is that"? i thought that they were watching people outside the building or birds flying in the air. i walked over to the window and watched something that was expelling exhaust from the tail end. i then watched this object fly across the sky, get lost in front of the sun's glare and emerge more clearly to see what the boys had seen- that there was a dark grey straight line in front (it was making a shadow in front of itself), and it was expelling white exhaust from the back. it was hard to see what exactly was between the grey frontal shadow and the exhast, or if teh frontal shadow was indeed an "object". at the time, i made sure to look around the sky and saw 2 commercial airplanes flying normally under the "object". one of the boys said "it looks like a missle"- i had to agree. the "missle" was much higher in the air than the 2 planes, and was much much faster. it was heading south, but angled in an upwards direction. the three of us watched the sky until the "missle" was out of our sight. the bell rang, the kids were dismissed to the busses, and i remanined watching the white exhaust lines in the sky wondering what it was that i just witnessed. the sun was now making a circular rainbow glow in the sky that i still could see driving down the parkway on my way home. it was quite a strange sight.
content.summary: Strange sight speeding past the sun

content.detailedDescription:
I was headed east on sr544 off of 27 south just outside haines city florida at 6:35am on monday 11-10-08. the sun was just breaking over the horizon when i noticed to the right of the sun an object shaped like a hersey kiss, it was gold in color and was about the size of my thumb nail at arms length. i pulled off to the side of the road to observe it better. the color contrasted with the yellow orange fireball of the sun which viewed was about the size of a golf ball at arms lenght.
the ufo was moving slowly to the south, after viewing for a moment or two i noticed two silvery objects exit from either side of the craft and flew off quickly to the east until they disappeared. a few moments after this the ufo started to fold in on itself(collaspe upon itself), until it too disappeared.
it was a clear morning with very few clouds, but what clouds there were, were at a higher altitude than the ufo or the sun.
having seen ufo's on several ocassions in my life, i've come to take then with a kind of ho-hum attitude. i mean i know they're here, have been here for eons, so it would take something spactacular to really get me excited at this stage in my life.
content.summary: Ufo shaped like a hersey kiss

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving towards camden on route 17a on way home.  i was comming home from working at nuclear plant. 

i observed low airborne lights to my left comming from williamstown ny heading mtowards oneida lake.  i thought aircraft was going to crash as hancock field not too far away.  i pulled over on side of road as i thought crash was imminent.

craft eventually flew over top of truck at tree top level around 60'.  moving at a very slow speed.  3 corner lights steady actinic white, 1 central light pulsating orange.  outline of large 300' triangular/delta craft was very clear.  graphite coloration.  no sound.  no effects to truck.  it did not appear to pay any attention to me yet there was some fear.

i wanted to get a better look at it, so went home to get 650 power telescope but craft was obscured by trees.  

there was another witness, but he prefers not to comment as he is still employed at nuclear facility.
content.summary: Typical black triangle as shown in belgian ufo photos.

content.detailedDescription: During my early morning exercise i looked up between the trees at the night sky. i noticed a very bright object moving from northwest to southeast at a relatively slow speed. when i first noticed it i thought it definitely wasn't a satellite because it was as bright as venus in its gibbous phase. at about 10 seconds after i noticed it there appeared to be a course change to the south. i continued watching for about 3 minutes until the object disappeared behind some trees. about 5 minutes after this sighting i noticed a dim object moving from west to east at a relatively fast speed. i figured this was a satellite because i've seen a similar object on the same trajectory at about the same speed before. i'm always watching the skies. i just wish that l.A. didn't have such light pollution.
content.summary: Very bright object appeared to change course

content.detailedDescription:
Beaumont ca - while waiting in line to enter oak valley parkway (closest intersection beaumont ave) just as the night was getting dark, significant high cloud cover, i looked east to check traffic. my intended path was west, eventually south on beaumont ave. i looked east to check the safety of moving into traffic and happened to notice what i thought initially was a plane flying pretty much right above oak valley heading west from cherry ave., appx 1/2 mile away. the plane seemed rather low flying, maybe 200 feet in the air. i defined it as a plane due to the configuration of the lighting, wingtip lights both horizontal and vertical.

traffic was not clear, so i continued to scan east. i then noticed the plane had not traveled very far, maybe 1 block at best, for how low and close it was. the distance from cherry ave to beaumont ave is appx 5 blocks, a plane would normally overtake that quickly. apparently i was mistaken, it had to be a helicopter based on this information. i then observed the "helicopter" make close turns over the blocks surrounding the area to the south, very close turns. this reinforced my thought it was a helicopter.

at this moment, looking at the configuration of the lights, i realized the layout was wrong for a chopper. i rolled my window down as i entered the roadway heading west to listen - not a sound. i heard no noise from any traditional airplane or helicopter. i am now in line for the turn at beaumont ave, craning my neck into my mirror and alternatively pivoting to see the craft over the area behind me. the vehicle has not really moved far from its original area, seemingly circled and returned to its original path. the lights did not blink like normal aircraft and was missing the really bright fast blinking white light i usually see on civilian aircraft.

the night was dark enough i could not make out the body of the vehicle, possibly. the lights were as follows: 4 red lights, 2 of which were not visible at all times apparently due to the orientation at the back(?) of the vehicle to my view, 2 lights on each wing tip(guess?) blinking at a very slow pace not in synch with each other (in fact one blinked off time with the other to eventually blink in unison for seconds, then well out of synch the remainder of the time). finally 2 "headlight" oriented lights, yellow/green in color and unchanging. none of these lights seemed to illuminate the vehicle in any way.

i had no option to stop longer and watch, for safety's sake. i had to make the turn and continue on. my destination was the corner of beaumont ave and 7th st, appx a mile away.

as i exited my vehicle at 7th st. i heard the familiar and incredibly noticeable blade noise of a helicopter heading my way. i could hear it well over a mile away, not military (as they usually are really loud and booming). as the chopper flew overhead i clearly saw the outline of the vehicle, its lighting not only appropriately spaced for a helicopter but also consisting of a familiar standard white quick-blinking light identifying it to me as a vehicle i am sure is just a helicopter. the white blinking light even illuminated the tail section. obviously much of this was markedly different from the craft i had seen moments earlier.

i returned to the area where my first sight of the craft occurred 15 minutes later, no luck in seeing the craft again.

i initially thought this was a standard aircraft, from a quick look. by the time i had made my left turn to head south on beaumont ave, i was somewhat concerned as the vehicle did not fit my expectations of an aircraft i knew. my family and i attend airshows regularly here in southern california. nothing related to my sighting made me feel comfortable in the thought it was a known vehicle, but nothing made me feel it was extra-terrestrial in any sense either. it could be experimental, but i cannot fathom why the test would go forward in this sleepy town, at night, in sight of a large group of people protesting prop 8.

i have attached my photoshop representation of my initial view of this craft. again, i could not see a shape, so this is all based on the light pattern.
content.summary: Silent hovering vehicle

content.detailedDescription:
Drove out to see a newsite. as we entered site i was made aware of a certain area. during the visit to the site i experienced a very strong electric...Drank to much coffee feeling until we crossed a certain point on the site. on the way out..(dark) i recieved a call that i had to go to work. shortly there after while still driving a yellowish large orb was pointed out to me where early i was told to look and there was nothing there. passenger in my truck used my surefire flash light and started blinking the light at the orb. orb stayed stationary. however shortly there after it seemed to release smaller sat ships. total sat ships counted was 7. at this point i was still not a believer. we parked the truck and after 10 mins or so of observing the sat ships i shut the truck off and turned off the lights.
i then exited the truck and stood at the left front corner and observed 4 sat ships flying a stacked 45 degree formation. sat ship 5 was in this general area flying a diff path and making short but extremely fast directional course changes. these 5 sat ships were behind and to the right side of the truck. the 2 remaining sat ships flying to the right front of the truck. number 6 slowly came up over a hill and i was still thinking it was a helicopter until as it stopped at the top of the hill. it stayed stationary for a few minutes and then did a zip to my right which covered at least 10-20 miles in almost the blink of an eye. at this time i was in shock and utter awe of what was unfolding in front of me. i then turned to get a visual of sat ship 7 and it was now turning and flying slow like that of a cessna and then crossed over the top of my position at the front of the truck at a 45 degree angle and slightly of to my left and held that heading until it reached a hill behind me and then made a lateral zip of 15-20 degrees in the sky. out of all the 7 sat ships one appeared to be a control ship and this was made mention to me by the passenger. i also observed that these sat ships were like small orbs that blinked a red light to mimic our standard faa accident avoidance lights on all aircraft. the sat ships were also very bright....Not a white light but a high intensity crystal bright light. the passenger repeatedly flashed the sat ships with mentioned flashlight which resulted in several of the sat ships changing the red light to an orange and then yellow light. at this point i had to pry myself away and make myself get back into the truck to head to work. as we got onto hwy 6/50 and started heading back to town the passenger noted 1 sat ship seemed to be following the trucks movements on the far side of the highway...Ie: matching pace...Stopping and restarting.
during the drive back to town as the passenger was keeping a watchful eye on said sat ship my cell phone rang. i was unable to get to it in ample time to take the call. when i reviewed the missed call it was an odd number and no voice mail message was left. after 2 or 3 mins of mulling around the idea i called the odd number back. i recieved an automated verizon cell message stating the number was not in service. the phone number was 1-754-777-7777. the correlation to 7 numbers and since all the digits were 7's seemed to be more than a coincedence. that night when i arrived at the job site i did do a google search for the number and found more than a few references to the number and the general thought that the number belonged to onstar and or xm sat radio. but there was no confirmation of this found during the search.
content.summary: Mother ship in canyon sent out 7 sat ships after flashing with flashlight.

content.detailedDescription: Last night at around 7:45 a bright star-like object appeared out of the northwest and was moving to the southeast.We watched the object until it disappeared.
content.summary: Star-like object moving from the northwest to the southeast

content.detailedDescription:
It was just after 10 pm in pirenopolis, brazil.  my husband and i were sitting on the balcony of our hotel room.  i was looking in the direction of the forest.  i saw a bright white circular light with a yellow outline, rising upwards.  this light stopped suddenly, remained stationary for about 10 seconds and accelerated downwards. at first i thought it could be ball lightening, until it returned.

in about 20 minutes, this light reappeared and seemed closer, or bigger.  this time it jumped to the left and right a few times which would leave a tail like yellow trail.  it stayed for about 10-15 seconds and again accelerated downwards.

in about 20-30 minutes it reappeared again and stood still before accelerating downwards.

in about one hour this light reappeared for the fourth and last time, this time a lot closer. this time it rose slowly and stayed still for a few seconds then just disappeared.  

my feelings during this event would have to be described as excited and calm and a desire to get closer.  my husband has always been a unbeliever in ufos, but not anymore, he also felt very happy to have had this experience.  at no time did we experience any fear.

the following morning i did my own research to make sure there are no military bases, etc. in that area.  there is nothing except forest, mountains, rivers and waterfalls.  it is a totally deserted area.  i spoke with a few of the locals and they confirmed that there are not even any roads in that part of the forest.  the locals also informed me that ufo sightings are becoming very common in central-east brazil.
content.summary: Bright white and yellow circular light over forest, returns four times.

content.detailedDescription:
my girlfriend michelle and i where leaving the house @ about 6:05 am to take her to work. as we walked towards her car, i pointed toward orion' belt, south, given that it was a nice clear morning, the sun was making its way up the mountain so you could still make out constilations but the sky was just turnig light blue, there was a lightning clouds south of us an over the horizon, i thought it would be great to tell her something i had just learned when, i saw someting that looked like a star underneath the costalation. the star was south of us but appears to be heading north. i that point i told michelle "look at that its moving fast" and as we look at it, it travel south to north east in about 10-15 seconds. as it traveled over our heads and suddenly it seemed, as a beacon would do, to shine on us. like someone pointing a flashlight at you from far away. at that point michelle jumped a bit in fright, i knew at that point without doubt we both had seen the same thing.
 as it passed, i was going throught a check list in my head; its way to high to be helicopter plus all i could hear was a slight and high hissing sound, no chopper does that; a plane or jet?., we are near the ontario airport, but it had no other blinking light (red or amber). if it was flying at normal hight, i would be able to hear it. if it was flying higher than usual ,jet or plane, it would appear to be traveling slower. it was traveling at such high rate of speed that that it took seconds to cross the sky in a stright line. to my knowlage, the higher the jet, the slower it appears to travel. then i thought it could be a commet/meteor. (which i have seen) it was not traveling that fast, it had no tail, and commets/meteors do not shine a light on you.
 it disapered going north east into the sky. we are still in awe of what we saw. 

thank you for your time.
content.summary: A star looking object traveled from the south horizon to north horizon in secs.

content.detailedDescription:
A bright oroange light remained still, and is still still as of 130am. 2 blue lights appear and disapear on either side.

i also saw a nother 3 lights oin a row below it further away.

i have on video.

this is not an airplane, antenna or anyhting ive ever seen.

i called austin airopirt security, kvue news.

i saw multiple objects?

not sure. they look like lights. very bright.

the lower one, second object was dimmer and near horizon plane. it wobbled a bit, then disapeared instantly.

some weather tower cams from
http://www.Kxan.Com/subindex/weather/tower_cams
copperfield

gotta go.

mr. r haliziw
austin tx
512 947 9665
content.summary: Oroange lights, 2 blue pulsating disapearing, multiple objects

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving on 271 headed south approximately 815 i watched this craft ahead of me to my right it was on a singular course. i noticed a bar of lights on either side. suddenly one bar of lights disappeared and the other bar stayed visible. i thought maybe it was a plane banking, but then the other bar of lights reappeared and i noticed the craft had not changed course. this continued to happen for approx 15 mins as i drove.
suddenly the craft appeared to stop and became stationary and i passed it.

the craft would have been in the vicinity or even slightly east of solon.
auburn or russeltownship area. 

personally i feel it may have been an experimental military craft of some sort.
content.summary: Row of lights either side disappearing and alternating then it stopped mid air

content.detailedDescription: I was driving south on 202 from king of prussia to newtown sq around 7pm tonight. off to the west i initially saw three star like objects. i thought they were planes and then realized that they were not moving along any flight path that i have ever seen in that area. then i noticed about a dozen or so more in the area. moving again off of any flight path. they were flying in every direction...Slow and steady. the lights were blinking bright white, red and green and seemed to flow in a circular motion. i took back roads home through radnor, strafford, and then to newtown sq. as i was driving i was looking up in the sky and these object seemed to be consistant two and three of them together at a time. when i pulled in my driveway i could still see them...To the north west of newtown sq (king of prussia pa area). there were two that seemed to be either circling or going back and forth in the northwest sky up until 9..Which is the last time i looked. ive never been into ufo's as a matter of fact, i wished i hadnt looked up tonight because now im scared to death. had to post though. i had to share this weird experience and see if others in the area may have seen the same phenomenon. the only person i shared with is my son..He saw them also. yeah...I wont be sleeping tonight...Guess i have a new hobby also!
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: What appeared to be stars or planes were in a triangle shape...Which initiall caught my eye. they were blinking white, red and green in a strange pattern...Did not appear to be airplanes

content.detailedDescription: I was on my lunch break from work. there is a pretty good view of the boston skyline from our building, and i like to look at it while i'm enjoying a cigarette. today i was sitting down looking at the city, and at first everything seemed normal, and then i realized that i was seeing two very bright lights that were not normally part of the skyline. i assumed my eyes were playing tricks on me, and decided that it was beacons on top of large buildings, however, after staring for a few more minutes i realized these light were very slowly moving, from right to left, i could gauge their movement in relation to how close or far they appeared to be from the prudential. my mind was trying to come up with rational explanations, and since i was observing them from a good distance i wasn't sure if they were blimps or helicopters, but then i saw a couple of planes fly by the same area, and their lights were dwarfed by the ones i had been watching. i'm not sure what i saw, but it was very unusual, and i'm reporting it in the hope that maybe someone else saw the lights too.
content.summary: Strange lights hovering over boston.

content.detailedDescription:
I was traveling north on route 91 in solon, ohio approaching parkside elementary school and solon high school when i saw flashing lights in the sky. there were four lights which flashed left to right that were slightly to my left looking out of the windshield. within a few seconds the set of lights suddenly zoomed quickly to the right in the sky and then continued on a quick pace to the left (west). i reached the stoplight at portz parkway (on right) and inwood drive (on left) and suddenly noticed a second set of lights exactly like the first set. i could still see the other set of lights in my peripheral as i watched the second set of lights suddenly zoom to the right and then continue moving left (west)just as the other set did. i watched the first one for almost a minute and the second one for about thirty seconds until traffic began to move. 

the weather was overcast with a slight fog and it was beginning to become dark. the lights were very bright and seemed to be like halogen lights (slight blue tint). it's difficult to say how high in the sky or how far away they were as i was driving at the time, though they did not look to be too high in the sky. i did not see any shape that would bring the lights together, but as i stated it was overcast and slightly hazy above the surface.
content.summary: Saw two separate sets of four horizontal lights, each set moved side to side quickly then moved west.

content.detailedDescription:
On march 31 after the year 2000 (i remember this was the same day some religous guys in texas were waiting for a ufo to pick them up)i was traveling west toward lake amistad. suddenly i saw a bright light that was still and no movement, this was approximately 30 to 40 miles away (far eye sight) and in matter of seconds lets say 3 seconds it traveled half the distance toward me.  still oval and shiny standing still for 10 to 20 seconds. after some light rays glowed from the bottom of the object in a 45 degree angle around the object.  the rays were about6 to 8 just on one side.  they extended about 30 feet, the light was a nice soft white, beutiful very eye catching. if the object would land next to me i would calculate its lenght to be about 100 to 120 feet wide by 25 to 30 feet height. 

the object took off to the north almost in the same direction it came from and gradually disappeard but traveling at a slower speed.

after this event i constantly look up at the sky with a hope to find this object since it was a harmless, pleasant, eye catching experience!
content.summary: Oval, shiny, with lights, and rays(like sunrays) under object in a 45 degree angle

content.detailedDescription:
on november 12, 2007 in stillwater, ok on the oklahoma state campus, i was returning to my apartment after my monday night class, which should have been around 9:20 local time. i was heading east from campus and as i got to a parking lot i saw two bright objects slowly floating down above a cloud, which appeared to be east of the campus. these objects were mostly white, perhaps with a dull yellowish tint, with a glow around the brighter center. at first i thought it was a meteor breaking up, (they were close together) but they continued to fall slowly, keeping shape and drifting in and out from each other. i was able to watch them for about 30 seconds until they disappeared behind the cloud. i���m guessing conservatively that they were anywhere from 5,000-20,000 feet in the air. 
	after they disappeared i began to search the sky because of the excitement and within probably 30 seconds of losing the first formation i saw something completely different, but much more intriguing. i saw, a formation of about 6-7 objects traveling in a checkmark formation across the sky. these objects looked like they were in orbit, and appeared like dashes ( - ) compared to the stars. this formation traveled from west to east, keeping a checkmark formation the entire time. i followed the formation with my eyes for about 15-20 seconds until they disappeared beyond the horizon. 
	i guess the first formation can be explained as flairs, but the second formation has me baffled. if you���ve seen the international space station fly across the sky before, i would say the formation was traveling about 2-3 times as fast across the sky.
        it wasn't until i began watching "ufo hunters" on the history channel that i got the idea to report this encounter online. i'm hoping that other ufo reports can be found from the area on the night of nov 12, 2007.
content.summary: Two completly different formations within two minutes over stillwater, ok.

content.detailedDescription: Myself and three other people were riding our horses and were near a single story barn. after we passed the barn we saw three big orange lights in a row. they were at an angle and moving about 30-4- miles an hour from the west to the north and they were about 100 feet off the ground. the lights were blinking on and off as they moved. we saw the lights for about five minutes. then all the lights flash off and it was gone.
content.summary: Me and 3 others saw three big orange lights that were hovering about  100 feet above the ground

content.detailedDescription:
I interviewed ms. ashleigh cole on thursday, october 30, 2008 at the hotel where i was staying while in stephenville. she said she had already been interviewed by whitney-white ashley, reporter from the empire tribune, the local newspaper in stephenville on friday october 24th. it should be noted that ms. ashley gave me ms. cole's name as a witness who seemed reliable.

ms. cole said that she an three other people were riding their horses on the the ranch that she manages on the night of october 23rd. all four people were riding about 20 feet away from a one-story barn and as they passed the west end of the barn, they saw three large orange lights hovering about 100 feet above the ground. the lights were very big and looked to be eliptical. about 150 feet away from the group. the lights were in a row that moved straight up and were on an angle. the lights stayed at an angle while they moved around the area. she said that the lights were observed for about five (5) minutes. the size of the object was 45' to about 50' long. the lights looks like they were attached to an object, but because the lights were so bright, she couldn't see the object, if there was one. the lights flashed on and off intemittently, then they just flashed off and it was gone. she further said that when the lights were moving she thought it was about 30-40 miles per hour. there were no military jets is the area at the time of the sighting, however, after the lights blinked out for the last time, jets, probably f-16's were seen in the sky several miles away, but not in the immediate area.

A friend of mine knocked on the door. she asked me to get my camera and come look at this thing in the sky. i stepped out the house and off in the distance was an orange ball of light. we went to another neighbors yard to get a closer look at it. i knocked on his door and told him what we were dong in his yard, and he came out too. the three of us stood there and watched this object for about 1 hour and then it started wobbling right to left and then up and down. i really didn't know what to think when i saw it so me and my friend just watched it. about 2 hours and 30 mins. went by and we were able to watch it go down behind the trees. we will be watching for it again tonight, because this is the second time we have see this object in the skys over the feild.
content.summary: Saw the orange light went to friends yard to watch it. we all watched it wobble and go down behind the trees.

content.detailedDescription: I was outside our house talking with my girlfriend and i turned around towards the house and i saw a large orange light hovering 400 to 500 feet over the house.  i ran inside to get my family and by the time we got out of the house the object had moved and disappeared.  it reappeared south about 2-3 miles away. it was hovering over a field at about the same height. there were military jets in the area, we counted four of them. we couldn't tell what type the jets were, but we could hear them. the jets came from the west and as they came near the orange light, which was round and about as big as our house, the light disappeared. the entire incident took about 1 minute or less. nothing appeared in the sky after the jets left the area. w took some video of the object.
content.summary: I was outside our house and i saw a big orange light  400' to 500' above our house.

content.detailedDescription: I was coming home from my friends house who i had visited.  as i pulled into my drive way at home, directly in front of me in the sky i saw a bright flash of white light almost like a fireball but not exactly.  it happened so quickly i couldn't exactly make out a shape.  i do know that it appeared to be heading down towards the ground and did not appear to be all that far away.  it is possible that this could have been a meteor however the light seemed to appear out of nowhere and disappeared as quickly as it came into my sight.  i would think that if it were a meteor the light would have been more constant and i would have saw it falling from the sky.  it was a very clear night and you could see every star in the sky and the moon was very bright.  the light i saw was just a bright (if not brighter) than the moon.  this sight gave me quite a scare because for some reason on my way home i somehow got the idea in my mind that i would see a ufo over my house.  perhaps it was because i just finished reading the book communion and since i began reading it about a week ago have had ufos on the brain. regardless i had this vision in my mind that i was going to see something unusual in the sky that night and that it would be right above my house.  to my surprise as i pulled into my drive way and that was when i saw the light.  if anyone thinks this was just a meteor please let me know.  it was very real i don't think that i imagined this.
content.summary: Bright flash of white light appeared coming down to the ground

content.detailedDescription:
== site specifics ==

- location -
  buffalo-depew train station  
  42��� 54���, 26.14��� n 
  78��� 43���, 31.83��� w 
  elev.: 675���

- time ���
   approx. 6.30pm, est
   thursday, november 6, 2008

-weather-
 condition: clear
 temp: 57���f 
 dewpoint: 45���f 
 humidity: 64% 
 visibility: 10.0 miles 
 barometric pressure: 30.03 inches, steady  
 wind: from ene, 7mph 

- flight path -
  generally sse, with some minor variance
  
note: the included graphics are not photographs but illustrations drawn up to support the given text. 

== recollection ==

on the evening this sighting occurred, my son & i were at the buffalo-depew train station. we were there that particular evening as my son���s hobby happens to be train spotting. 

we were standing at a spot near the train station when i happened to look straight up. hovering directly above were two, large brilliantly bright bluish-white ufos. they were spherical, hovering motionless and were perfectly silent. i knew immediately something wasn���t quite right as there shouldn���t have been anything that bright in the night sky at that position that evening. i had no way of determining either their altitude or actual size, however holding a green pea at arms length directly above you will give a good idea as to how large they appeared when observed from the ground. (see dep1).

anyway, i yelled to my son to look up and he saw them as well. he also happened to have his binoculars with him (remember, we were there train spotting) and immediately had a closer look. a moment after he began watching them through his binoculars, they began moving on a generally sse heading. as they proceeded, they maneuvered around each other in a leisurely fashion, with the light surrounding the two ufos changing in both color and intensity. 

we kept passing the binoculars back and forth watching in amazement as the two ufos tracked southward. then, from the north east came speeding a third ufo, identical to and joining up with the first two. shortly after the 3rd object arrived, they arranged themselves in the shape of a perfect equilateral triangle, then became perfectly motionless, simply hovering in complete silence. they stayed motionless for perhaps 10 seconds or so. (see dep2) they then began spinning around, once again in unison, then stopped - in unison - and continued along, moving ��� you guessed it - in perfect unison, on the sse heading. it should be noted that when they were spinning, they did so at a velocity sufficient to make these three distinct objects blur into what appeared to be a circle of solid, bluish-white light.

following the preceding display, they didn���t stay in the triangle shape for long. as they proceeded along their course, two of the three objects shifted their position relative to the third and formed a perfectly straight line. imagine an arrow in flight and you���ve got the idea.
(see dep3).

at one point, while my son & i were passing the binoculars back & forth one of the 3 ufos took off for parts unknown, but neither of us saw which direction it headed. the remaining two continued heading southward, eventually disappearing from sight.

== analysis ==

these craft were in possession of a propulsion system far in advance of anything current earth-sourced technology can produce. their navigation was intelligently controlled and their movement was at all times purposeful. 

the glow surrounding these craft was clearly the result of a plasma, arising in turn as a result of ionized, excited air molecules surrounding the craft. the glow had no characteristics not attributable to a plasma. the varying of both color & brightness resulted from varying energy levels and energy amounts, respectively, of the ionizing radiation produced by the ufo���s propulsion system. 

regarding this, the energy the electrons impart to each photon determines the wavelength, and thus color emitted, from 1.65 ev (red) all the way up to 3.26 ev (blue) or more. as well, with the increase of activation energy per unit area/second (power/unit area) generated in the vicinity of the craft comes naturally an increase in apparent brightness of the plasma. 

maneuvers requiring increased thrust were always preceded by an increase in the plasma brightness, with a concomitant shift in the "tone" of the light emitted from a warmer (amber) white to a bluish-white.  regardless of the thrust required at any particular moment, the plasma remained sufficiently well developed that at all times it exceeded a critical-distance thickness (a few feet)  rendering it opaque to the light of its own emission frequencies. another words, the craft remained obscured by the plasma it generated. at no time were i or my son able to discern the actual object enveloped by the plasma, even with the aid of his binoculars. 

based on the empirically-derived evidence provided by this sighting i can only conclude the three craft employed a vectored wave filed propulsion system, something that is, to my knowledge, beyond the reach of current earth-sourced technology. at no point did any of the ufos demonstrate any performance\flight characteristics not consistent with the application of a vectored wave field propulsion system.

== conjecture ==

i���d like to wrap this up by offering some observations for which i can offer no supporting evidence, empirical or otherwise. another words, what follows is a collection of personal opinions, which may be right or completely wrong. 

when i first observed the 2 ufos directly overhead, i got the sense they were watching something. as to the questions what they were watching and why i thought they were watching something, i don���t think i���ll ever know the answer. as an aside, i���d prefer to think it coincidence that when i first spotted the ufos they were positioned relative to one another in a fashion identical to how my son & i were positioned (he was to my right and just a bit in front of me). 

when the 3rd ufo joined up with the original 2, they did so over a large garbage dump. i don���t know if it was coincidence or if this carried some significance. i also got the sense the three ufos were exchanging information. i should repeat here this is just personal opinion and i have no way of proving any of this.

the flight path chosen neatly skirted around buffalo and took them in a direction heading for the hills of eastern pennsylvania, which i thought would be ideal if minimizing the chance
of detection was important. 

last, this is an experience that has been as overwhelmingly fascinating as it is deeply disturbing. i don���t think i���ll ever forget this. on balance, though, i sincerely hope i never see even one of these things again.
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 2 ufos were spotted geading sse, later joined by a third.

content.detailedDescription: I was looking out my window, looked up into the sky just for the hell of it. about 3 or 4 seconds after i looked, i saw a blue circle like, disk shapped object fly by. it lasted for about 2-3 seconds. my first thought was a plane, but then i though that planes could not fly as fast as what i saw. my second theory was, a commet or shooting star, but i had never seen a blue commet or shooting star. so that only leaves one explination, a ufo. the blue light disappeared from my sight after 2-3 seconds, it went over some trees and then disappeared.
content.summary: Blue circle like passing by.

content.detailedDescription:
I was at home on a break from work when my wife looked out the kitchen window and said, "oh, look! there is a ufo in the sky!" "ya, sure." i replied thinking she was joking. "no!" she responded, "for real!" she then said she thought they might be balloons again. the past several weeks we had some balloons from local functions in the community escape that could possibly fool some people at a glace.

i went to the window and took one good look and new instantly these where not balloons. there were three bright white shimmering objects straight south approx 30 degrees elev. they were in the shape of a triangle with the top center one the brightest and almost appeared to be two overlapping. i would compare it to the brightest star or planet such as venus and approx 3 times larger in the sky. the lower left was very bright but not as big. the lower right one was half as bright as the left one and a little closer to the top one.

i told my wife to keep watching while i got my video camera. canon xh-a1 hi-def set at 1080i 60i fps. by the time i grabbed the camera, inserted the battery and an hd dv tape and got outside to the patio to start filming, a good minute had pasted. i set the camera to full auto mode so i would not wast anymore time making manual adjustments. by profession i am a videographer and an independant filmmaker. i do alot of "gun and run" or "shoot and scoot" at weddings and events. this camera does very well in those uncontrolled environments. i asked my wife to get my tripod in hopes of getting a nice steady shot. in the mean time i steadied myself against the patio support post. the camera has a 20x optical zoom and would need to be as steady as possible on full zoom. i did have to turn on one stop on the nd filter plus there was no uv filter on the lens, fyi.

as i filmed i noticed that there was a fouth object to the lower right of the other three and the three were in a wider upside down "v" patteren much like three aircraft in formation with the fourth man out military style, excecept if this were the case of actual airplains then they would be comming towards us, these seemed to remain in a fixed possition in the sky with no direction of travel. i noted that all high altitude jet aircraft that day were leaving very heavy vapor trails, these had none.

as my wife returned with the tripod the objects started to fade in and out and the camera started to have problems staying in focus lock and i was having a hard time keeping in frame with the view finder. the objects instantly disappeared. i had a total of 46 seconds of actual video of the objects.

i down loaded the video into my computer using sony vegas pro-8 software. upon evaluating the video on an hd monitor i could see that my camera took a little longer than normal to focus lock on the objects when i zoomed in. once it did i could see they had more of a white cigar shape with a faint blury smear to the left of each. the left object was now not as bright as the right and closer to the top one while the right one was a little further away and not as bright as it was when viewed at the kitchen window. halfway through the video i could see the fourth object got very bright at on point then faded with the others. when played in slow motion i could see a definate pulsing of the white light which seemed to totally surround whatever the object was at times.

towards the end of the video and enlarging the frames or zooming in tighter with the editing software, it appeared the bright white was fading and an actual object was taking form. on the last few frames zoomed in it almost looked like an airplane with no tail fin. a center body with left and right wings but no center fin. the camera could no longer hold focus and they where gone.

at the beginning of the video i marked a reference point on one of the tree branches to the top center object. near the end of the video i marked the same two points. the objects were in the same position and angle on the screen indicating to me they had not changed position through the whole scene clip.

about an hour later a high altitude commercial jet was passing over to the north of us and the sun was reflecting off of it similar to the bright white light of the four objects except the jet was leaving a heavy vapor trail. curious, i grabbed my camera again and did a test shot to compair. the camera instantly focus locked when zoomed. i could make out every detail of the jet liner. the body, the wings, the tail and even the nose shape. the bright glare from the body was clearly distinguishable but not interfearing with the details of the craft. the glare was not pulsing or seperating.

since this event i have not found anyone who wittnessed the same in order to get validation and a position triangulation. it is my feeling that these objects were very far away and not in the local proximity. possibly so far that the atmosphere may have been playing tricks on light and magnification. also the sun would not have been side reflecting off them since they were to the south and not to the north like the jet was.

i have been a photographer and videographer for over 20 years and shot a lot of aircraft and things in the sky both nightime and daytime. i have always beleived that most everything can be explained and have. however, i do know that sometimes an anomaly may occure that the common person cannot identify or explain. right now i cannot identify or explain this one. in all my years of expereance in the navy, a nasa certified electonics inspector during the apollo program, a law enforcement officer, envolvment in space communications programs, photography and videography this one caught me totaly by surprise and slightly unprepaired for the expereance.

if you can come up with any information that would explain what this was
or even what it definitly was not it would be greatly appreciated by my wife and i.

thank you.
content.summary: Three bright white objects in triangle, due south 30 degrees elev, clear sky, fourth object appeared lower right of others all glimmering then fadded and disappeared, caught on hd video.

content.detailedDescription: I went outside the nursing home i work at to have a cigarette at approximately 4 am and noticed a bright light just beyond the trees, there was no noise as i thougt at first it was probably a helicopter but it moved left to right very fast and it got brighter the closer it got. when it moved very quickly sideways again and just shot up in the sky till it disappeared.  i was so stunned and scared at what i had just seen that while it was in front of me i couln't even move. when it left i threw my cigarette and ran inside.  i am not a believer but i saw something i won't soon forget. the area i work in is not closely populated, it is old farm land surrounded by woods
content.summary: I went outside for a cigarette and was just looking up at the sky through the trees, object came my way, i saw it through the trees

content.detailedDescription:
It's the second time i submit this report, the first time the interface ate my text, and i was too angry to type it again. btw mufon people, please use a better interface, thanks.

i work on an airport, my office has a large window looking toward the runway and the wood area behind it.
on october 3, i was talking with a friend and looking in the direction of the window. i suddenly noticed a bright sunlight that was reflected on a shiny surface, it was something that was flying/gliding above ground.
i first attributed it to an helicopter or a small aircraft in the aerodrome circuit, but when watching closely i noticed it was none of these. the object glided behind a patch of trees on a hill. i waited to see if it was reappearing on the other side of the hill but it never reappeared. the total observation time was approx. 5 seconds.
the object was spherical, exactly like the cockpit on a small helicopter (like a bell 47 for example) but there was no "body" behind it and no rotor either, only the sphere. the sun was reflected on it like it would be on a car windshield or a cockpit (it was a very bright day, and it is a carribean island).
the size and appearance were very much like a helicopter cockpit (i'd say 1.5 meters in diameter) it was flying above the ground, approx. 10 meters above and at the level of the trees. it was going very fast, i would estimate the speed to about 100 kilometers per hour or faster, faster than a small aircraft taking off or landing, but there was a strange quality to the flight, it seemed like it was almost gliding , it looked also as if it was slightly bouncing on the air, like a rock ricocheting on the surface of water.

i could see no details or colors on the object because of the bright reflection. the appearance was like a cockpit or maybe a big weather balloon. 
i don't think that it was a weather balloon because it was going very fast and it was going in the exact opposite direction of the wind. it was moving parallel to the runway but behind it, outside of the airport.
if i had to extrapolate its movement backwards, it's almost as it was coming from the sea inland (the airport is close to the sea).
helis generally don't fly in that area and altitude, and it was not a plane (or it would have crashed). i also rule out any object moved by the wind (like a balloon or a kite) because of speed and movement against wind.
at the distance it was and behind the heavy soundproof window, there was no possibility for me to listen to a possible noise.
i was alone to make this observation.

i work on airports, it's the second time i report something unusual on this website. for the other report, search the database for an event in france in 1993.
content.summary: Bright sun reflection on sphere in full day.

content.detailedDescription:
i was walking home from buying a soda when i looked up at the sky. two very bright lights caught my eye, they had to be the brightest in the sky. the lights didn't move, as i wathed them i noticed what looked like a small satellite light passing by the lights. the sat light kept moving in a straight line until i couldn't focus on it anymore. then i looked back at the two bright lights. another sat light was passing the two lights.. at this time i started thinking something was kinda weird.. that sat light moved passed the lights almost like it was following the previous sat light. after i couldn't see the sat light anymore, the two bright lights started to dim until they vanished. i was pretty excited to see something so strange, cause about two nights before i saw something else very ufo like...

   two days ago i think. i was walking home from work.. it was about 7:30pm and i was halfway home walking through woodward park. i decided to look up at the sky, and i saw something. to me at first it looked like a shooting star, and i can't explain it quite right but it looked like instead of falling it was going up?? or like horizonaly towards me?? i didn't have much time to think about it because as soon as the light dissapeared it reapeared and shot in a different 90 degree angle then dissapeared again.. 

    both of these events seem extremely weird to me. if someone has an explaination i would love to hear it.

                                                       -nick
content.summary: Two stationary bright lights with two satellite like lights passing behind

content.detailedDescription:
Using 23x spotter scope with attached near infrared webcam, spotted ufo above calgary, alberta.

edited for length and detail video attached along with original video.
content.summary: Fractal camouflaged near infrared ufo high above calgary, alberta.

content.detailedDescription: It was tuesday evening, october 28 at first baptist mission (corner of simmons and gifford), brownwood, tx, at 8:00 in the evening.  i was loading food into the back of my van and after loading my first load i turned to go back in and get a second load.  my eyes as i turned were immediately drawn to three bright amber lights, bright and large in the sky that shone towards where i was standing.  the light didn't reach to where i was standing, like in a flood light.  my van faced kind of south, thus when i was standing next to the side of my van i was kind of east.  the lights were above the tree line, just almost at a 45 degree angle up.  i stood for a moment trying to figure out why a plane was so low and then realized it was not moving, just there in the sky with these very bright amber lights.  i called my husband to come out.  he came out and saw the same thing.  suddenly the lights went out and all i could see was a small green flashing light.  it started moving towards the southeast, fairly quickly.  when suddenly a second set of lights came in.  at first we thought it was an airplane as it was blinking the green light, but, all of the sudden there were three bright amber lights show on it.  then, all of the sudden the first object was back in the same location with its three amber lights on.  they faced each other with their three amber lights on and it was like they both just sat there.  suddenly a plane came from the direction of the airport, which would be the direction the second object came from, kind of puttering along, like a small engine plane.  first we thought it might be a third object, but as soon as we heard the puttering, we realized it was truly a plane, not an object.  then we realized we hadn't heard any noise from these other objects which all of the sudden, as soon as we heard the puttering, turned off their amber lights, both put on their green blinking light (only one green light on each object)and the first object zipped away (literally was gone in a flash) to the southeast and in about three, maybe four blinks was gone; the second object did the exact same thing except it went to the northeast.  the puttering plane continued on its journey to the southwest.  we stood there for a moment, just watching the sky, wondering what we really had just seen.  neither one of us saw anymore than the amber/green lights...Could not see the shape of the object or any thing else about it.  the whole event lasted about ten minutes.  neither myself nor my husband had any feelings of being scared or even nervous about what we had seen; it was a feeling of being curious.  after standing outside another 5-6 minutes, we resumed our packing and one more time, before we left, we gazed up into the sky to see if we saw anything else; we didn't.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Sited two objects in the sky; each with 3 amber lights, then fast green lights
